page.title: 11Provision of health care.
page.content: The general standard of health of the community is relatively high. The nearest{health centre}is at Southwell and this is well equipped and offers a comprehensive service. {Dentists}are also at Southwell. For the minority of people without their own transport, the standard of health care is very much reduced as doctors are unlikely to make home visits except in cases of emergency. {District Nurses}and{Health Visitors visit those in need of special care. {Hospitals}are at Newark, Nottingham and Mansfield. Waiting lists are long for all non-emergency operations and many people belong to{private health care schemes in order to receive more prompt hospital treatment. Welfare of the elderly in the villages tends to be the responsibility of relatives and neighbours.
